Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Morpha#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.
